title: Favorite James Bond actor in the United States 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 6 different Actors for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 5 groups, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents in Actor Sean Connery and Very unfavorable had the lowest Share of respondents in Actor Sean Connery.
Among all the Actors, Somewhat favorable had the highest Share of respondents 35.0 in Actor Timothy Dalton and lowest value 21.0 in Actor Sean Connery.
Actor Timothy Dalton and Sean Connery had the biggest gap of 14.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Somewhat favorable.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 6 different Actors for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion that are presented on the X-axis.
In Actor Sean Connery, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 among the 5 groups and in Sean Connery, Very unfavorable had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 6 different Actors for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 5 groups, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents in Actor Sean Connery and Very unfavorable had the lowest Share of respondents in Actor Sean Connery.
Among all the Actors, Somewhat favorable had the highest Share of respondents 35.0 in Actor Timothy Dalton and lowest value 21.0 in Actor Sean Connery.
Actor Timothy Dalton and Sean Connery had the biggest gap of 14.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for Somewhat favorable.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 6 different Actors for 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 5 groups, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents in Actor Sean Connery and Very unfavorable had the lowest Share of respondents in Actor Sean Connery.
In Actor Timothy Dalton, Somewhat favorable had the maximum Share of respondents and it saw the lowest in Actor Sean Connery out of all 6 Actors.
The maximum Share of respondents for Somewhat favorable that was found in Actor Timothy Dalton was 1.67 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Actor Sean Connery.
Among the groups, Very favorable had the biggest difference in Share of respondents. Where the maximum Share of respondents was 8.71 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents.

In Actor Sean Connery, Very favorable had the highest Share of respondents 61.0 among the 5 groups and in Sean Connery, Very unfavorable had the lowest Share of respondents 2.0. The second highest Share of respondents 16.0 was observed for Very favorable in Actor Sean Connery.

On average, the Actor Daniel Craig had the highest Share of respondents for all 5 groups Very favorable, Somewhat favorable, Somewhat unfavorable, Very unfavorable, and Don't know/no opinion. Whereas Sean Connery had the lowest average Share of respondents.
